amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that any rule intended to ensure the safety of natural gas or hazardous materials pipelines or prevent, mitigate, or reduce the impact of spills from such pipelines is not considered a "major rule".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 115-1 to ensure that any rule intended to ensure the safety of natural gas or hazardous materials pipelines or prevent, mitigate, or reduce the impact of spills from such pipelines is not considered a "major rule".

vote.text: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 235 (Roll no. 19).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 235 (Roll no. 19).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. McNerney.
